dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.deals-safely.net]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 08, 2005 4:58 PM
To: babbey@escrow.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.deals-safely.net]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.deals-safely.net
Date: Wed, 8 Jun 2005 09:05:11 -0700
From: Brandon Abbey <babbey@escrow.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>,        <legal@theplanet.com>,
<support@theplanet.com>
CC: la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov, ifcc33@ic3.gov

It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.
<http://www.deals-safely.net> deals-safely.net



This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention that your company
provides services to a website, www.
<http://www.deals-safely.net> deals-safely.net, which is infringing on
Escrow.com's intellectual property rights to the material posted on
Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/> ).  This site has stolen
content from Escrow.com and claims an affiliation with our companies.
Please disable this site immediately.



Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the www.
<http://www.deals-safely.net> deals-safely.net site, www.
<http://www.deals-safely.net/company.php> deals-safely.net/company.php.
Neither Escrow.com nor IES has any affiliation with deals-safely.net, and
has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of
is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.



The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.




Brandon W. Abbey
Managing Director
Escrow.com
16275 Laguna Canyon Road
Irvine, CA  92618
Direct - 949-790-5880
Fax - 949-790-5811



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCp2nkvK/XpJs6oyURAvvAAKCN8m1569+G3i6aHuAzalS8M/a95wCgra7h
SNoBOfjdTvUjWzHPTbteFBs=
=nsZl
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
